data.name: StudentSubject.SelectCommand
data.value: select st.StudentID, sb.SubjectCode, lA.Description, CASE WHEN ss.FirstPeriodicRating = NULL THEN 0 ELSE ss.FirstPeriodicRating END as "1G", CASE WHEN ss.FirstPeriodicRating = NULL THEN ' ' WHEN ss.FirstPeriodicRating < 75 THEN 'D' WHEN ss.FirstPeriodicRating > 74 AND ss.FirstPeriodicRating < 80 THEN 'FS' WHEN ss.FirstPeriodicRating > 79 AND ss.FirstPeriodicRating < 85 THEN 'S' WHEN ss.FirstPeriodicRating > 84 AND ss.FirstPeriodicRating < 90 THEN 'VS' WHEN ss.FirstPeriodicRating > 89 THEN 'O' END as "1P", CASE WHEN ss.SecondPeriodicRating = NULL THEN 0 ELSE ss.SecondPeriodicRating END as "2G", CASE WHEN ss.SecondPeriodicRating = NULL THEN ' ' WHEN ss.SecondPeriodicRating < 75 THEN 'D' WHEN ss.SecondPeriodicRating > 74 AND ss.SecondPeriodicRating < 80 THEN 'FS' WHEN ss.SecondPeriodicRating > 79 AND ss.SecondPeriodicRating < 85 THEN 'S' WHEN ss.SecondPeriodicRating > 84 AND ss.SecondPeriodicRating < 90 THEN 'VS' WHEN ss.SecondPeriodicRating > 89 THEN 'O' END as "2P", CASE WHEN ss.ThirdPeriodicRating = NULL THEN 0 ELSE ss.ThirdPeriodicRating END as "3G", CASE WHEN ss.ThirdPeriodicRating = NULL THEN ' ' WHEN ss.ThirdPeriodicRating < 75 THEN 'D' WHEN ss.ThirdPeriodicRating > 74 AND ss.ThirdPeriodicRating < 80 THEN 'FS' WHEN ss.ThirdPeriodicRating > 79 AND ss.ThirdPeriodicRating < 85 THEN 'S' WHEN ss.ThirdPeriodicRating > 84 AND ss.ThirdPeriodicRating < 90 THEN 'VS' WHEN ss.ThirdPeriodicRating > 89 THEN 'O' END as "3P", CASE WHEN ss.FourthPeriodicRating = NULL THEN 0 ELSE ss.FourthPeriodicRating END as "4G", CASE WHEN ss.FourthPeriodicRating = NULL THEN ' ' WHEN ss.FourthPeriodicRating < 75 THEN 'D' WHEN ss.FourthPeriodicRating > 74 AND ss.FourthPeriodicRating < 80 THEN 'FS' WHEN ss.FourthPeriodicRating > 79 AND ss.FourthPeriodicRating < 85 THEN 'S' WHEN ss.FourthPeriodicRating > 84 AND ss.FourthPeriodicRating < 90 THEN 'VS' WHEN ss.FourthPeriodicRating > 89 THEN 'O' END as "4P", CASE WHEN ss.FourthPeriodicRating = NULL THEN 0 ELSE ss.FourthPeriodicRating END as "FG", CASE WHEN ss.FourthPeriodicRating = NULL THEN ' ' WHEN ss.FourthPeriodicRating < 75 THEN 'D' WHEN ss.FourthPeriodicRating > 74 AND ss.FourthPeriodicRating < 80 THEN 'FS' WHEN ss.FourthPeriodicRating > 79 AND ss.FourthPeriodicRating < 85 THEN 'S' WHEN ss.FourthPeriodicRating > 84 AND ss.FourthPeriodicRating < 90 THEN 'VS' WHEN ss.FourthPeriodicRating > 89 THEN 'O' END as "FP" from Students as st join StudentEnrollments stE on ste.StudentId = st.StudentId left outer join Subjects sb on st.GradeLevel = sb.GradeLevel join LearningAreas lA on lA.LearningAreaCode = sb.LearningAreaCode left outer join StudentSubjects ss on SUBSTRING(ss.StudentSY,1,8) = st.StudentId and ss.SubjectCode = sb.SubjectCode where st.StudentId = @StudentID order by ss.StudentSY asc

data.name: StudentTrait.SelectCommand
data.value: select st.StudentID, sb.Description, CASE WHEN ss.FirstPeriodicRating = NULL THEN ' ' WHEN ss.FirstPeriodicRating < 75 THEN 'NI' WHEN ss.FirstPeriodicRating > 74 AND ss.FirstPeriodicRating < 80 THEN 'MS' WHEN ss.FirstPeriodicRating > 79 AND ss.FirstPeriodicRating < 85 THEN 'S' WHEN ss.FirstPeriodicRating > 84 AND ss.FirstPeriodicRating < 90 THEN 'VS' WHEN ss.FirstPeriodicRating > 89 THEN 'O' END as "1", CASE WHEN ss.SecondPeriodicRating = NULL THEN ' ' WHEN ss.SecondPeriodicRating < 75 THEN 'NI' WHEN ss.SecondPeriodicRating > 74 AND ss.SecondPeriodicRating < 80 THEN 'MS' WHEN ss.SecondPeriodicRating > 79 AND ss.SecondPeriodicRating < 85 THEN 'S' WHEN ss.SecondPeriodicRating > 84 AND ss.SecondPeriodicRating < 90 THEN 'VS' WHEN ss.SecondPeriodicRating > 89 THEN 'O' END as "2", CASE WHEN ss.ThirdPeriodicRating = NULL THEN ' ' WHEN ss.ThirdPeriodicRating < 75 THEN 'NI' WHEN ss.ThirdPeriodicRating > 74 AND ss.ThirdPeriodicRating < 80 THEN 'MS' WHEN ss.ThirdPeriodicRating > 79 AND ss.ThirdPeriodicRating < 85 THEN 'S' WHEN ss.ThirdPeriodicRating > 84 AND ss.ThirdPeriodicRating < 90 THEN 'VS' WHEN ss.ThirdPeriodicRating > 89 THEN 'O' END as "3", CASE WHEN ss.FourthPeriodicRating = NULL THEN ' ' WHEN ss.FourthPeriodicRating < 75 THEN 'NI' WHEN ss.FourthPeriodicRating > 74 AND ss.FourthPeriodicRating < 80 THEN 'MS' WHEN ss.FourthPeriodicRating > 79 AND ss.FourthPeriodicRating < 85 THEN 'S' WHEN ss.FourthPeriodicRating > 84 AND ss.FourthPeriodicRating < 90 THEN 'VS' WHEN ss.FourthPeriodicRating > 89 THEN 'O' END as "4", gl.Description as [GradeLev] from Students as st join StudentEnrollments stE on ste.StudentId = st.StudentId join GradeLevels gl on stE.GradeLevel = gl.GradeLevel left outer join Traits sb on sb.Category = gl.Category left outer join StudentTraits ss on SUBSTRING(ss.StudentSY,1,8) = st.StudentId and ss.TraitsID = sb.TraitsID where st.StudentId = @StudentID order by ss.StudentSY asc

data.name: StudentDetails.SelectCommand
data.value: select (st.LastName + ', ' + st.FirstName + ' ' + SUBSTRING(st.MiddleName,1,1)) as [StudentName], st.Gender as [Sex], st.DOB as [Date of Birth], st.POBProvince as [Province], st.POBTownCity as [City/Town], st.POBBarangay as [Barrio], st.GuardiansName, st.GuardiansOccupation, st.HomeAddress + ' ' + st.HomeBarangay + ' ' + st.HomeTownCity + ' ' +st.HomeProvince as [Adress], st.LastSYAttendedDCFI, st.Average, stE.GradeLevel, gl.Description as [Level], SUBSTRING(stE.StudentSY,9,9) as SY from Students as st join StudentEnrollments as stE on ste.StudentId = st.StudentId join GradeLevels as gl on gl.GradeLevel = stE.GradeLevel where st.StudentId = @StudentID Order by GradeLevel, SUBSTRING(stE.StudentSY,9,9) asc
